txt.en: The Battle Map panel allows you to access all of the Epic Battle instances. Select the instance off the map and the group size you would like to play. Then either Launch to create and play a space now, or Queue to ask Instance Finder to locate for you a group to play with.\n\nThe Rewards portion indicates how close you are to receiving Bronze, Silver, Gold, or Platinum level rewards. For Bronze and Silver you can select whether you wish to receive jewellery pieces (the chest) or progress in the next level up (the arrow) when the current level has filled.
